00001 // ORMksPdr2000Decoder.hh
00002 /*
00003  * Decoder for MksPdr2000 which measures pressure and time.  It is very similar
00004  * to the BocTIC3 
00005  */
00006 #ifndef _ORMksPdr2000Decoder_hh_
00007 #define _ORMksPdr2000Decoder_hh_
00008 
00009 #include "ORVBasicTreeDecoder.hh"
00010 
00011 class ORMksPdr2000Decoder: public ORVBasicTreeDecoder
00012 {
00013   public:
00014     ORMksPdr2000Decoder() {}
00015     virtual ~ORMksPdr2000Decoder() {}
00016     enum EORMksPdr2000Consts {kNumChannels = 3};
00017     enum EORMksPdr2000Units { kUnknown = 0,
00018                               kTorr,
00019                               kmBar,
00020                               kPascal,
00021                               kArbitrary };
00022     
00023     virtual inline EORMksPdr2000Units GetUnits(UInt_t* record) 
00024       {return (EORMksPdr2000Units)((record[1] >> 16) & 0xf);} 
00025 
00026     /* The number of channels in this card. */
00027     virtual inline UInt_t GetNumberOfChannels() {return (UInt_t)kNumChannels;}
00028  
00029     virtual inline UShort_t GetDeviceID(UInt_t* record) {return record[1] & 0xfff;} 
00030     /* Return the id of the device. */
00031 
00032     virtual Float_t GetPressureOfChannel(UInt_t* record, UInt_t channel); 
00033     /* Pressure of a channel. */
00034 
00035     virtual UInt_t GetTimeOfChannel(UInt_t* record, UInt_t channel); 
00036     /* Time in channel given in seconds since 1 Jan 1970. */
00037 
00038     virtual void Dump(UInt_t* record);
00039     /* Provides a debug dump of the record. */
00040 
00041 
00042     virtual std::string GetDataObjectPath() 
00043       { return "MksPdr2000Model:Pressures"; }  
00044     
00045     /* Satisfying the ORVBasicTreeDecoder interface. */
00046     virtual size_t GetNPars() { return 5; } 
00047     virtual size_t GetNRows(UInt_t* /*record*/) { return GetNumberOfChannels(); }
00048     virtual std::string GetParName(size_t iPar);
00049     virtual UInt_t GetPar(UInt_t* record, size_t iPar, size_t iRow);
00050 };
00051 
00052 #endif
